_comments.enter_timeout_s: Not used in auto-loop; keep null.
_comments.loop_enter_timeout_s: Not used in auto-loop; keep null.
_comments.post_enter_settle_ms: After the initial Enter (you place the current piece), wait this long before the first automated drop.
_comments.rescan_after_drop_delay_ms: Pause (ms) after each drop so the game updates the Next area before re-scanning.
_comments.mouse_move_duration_ms: Smooth mouse move time (ms) into the target box.
_comments.pre_left_click_sleep_ms: Pause (ms) after the cursor arrives, before left click.
_comments.left_click_hold_ms: How long (ms) to hold the left button before release.
_comments.post_left_click_sleep_ms: Pause (ms) after the left click finishes.
_comments.pre_right_click_sleep_ms: Pause (ms) before the right-click flip (if needed).
_comments.right_click_hold_ms: How long (ms) to hold the right button before release.
_comments.flip_click_delay_ms: Delay (ms) after the right-click flip so the game updates piece order.
_comments.post_drop_sleep_ms: Small pause (ms) right after dropping (before any other actions).
_comments.validation_mouse_park_delay_ms: Delay (ms) after parking mouse in mouse_parking area before validating pieces.
_comments.validation_initial_delay_ms: Initial delay (ms) before first validation attempt to let game animations complete.
_comments.validation_max_attempts: Maximum number of validation attempts before failing.
_comments.auto_loop_interval_ms: Time (ms) between automated drops AFTER the first one (default here: 2000 ms = 2s).
